title: Pixel 5 - No Sound from Speakers Nor BLE Headphone
content:
This issue started today (24/02/21) - I hear no sound what so ever from the phone:
No media, notifications, call, phone ring etc.
I tried both using the speaker and via BLE headphones and it behaves the same (this rules out speaker HW issue).

When using "Sound Amplifier" app using the headphone I do hear the surrounding so that's surly not HW issue. Volume is back to normal after restart but might occur again after a few min/hours making the phone useless! Any thoughts?
